name: Odyssey (SquirrelsDrunken)
description:
Submission to the Enter Name Studio Jam #5
By the SquirrelsDrunken Team

CONTROLS:

Q and E to rotate main sail (To go the fastest, make your sail perpendicular to the wind)
A and D to turn

Press W to toggle your anchor

Credits :
Shockbyte, https://shockbyte.itch.io/
WindWolf8, https://windwolf8.itch.io/
Tappwel, https://tappwel.itch.io/

Special thanks to Frederico Calchera#7059 on Discord and Rotsprite.
